title: Guided Regularized Random Forest Feature Selection ‚Äî grrf_filter
text: Guided Regularized Random Forest (GRRF) algorithm works follows: Fit initial unregularized random forest obtain variable importance scores Normalize importance scores use compute regularization coefficients: coefReg = (1 - gamma) + gamma * normalized_importance Fit regularized random forest using coefficients penalize splits less important variables Return variables positive importance regularized model Class weights used handle class imbalance. Variables terminal nodes weighted class, splits evaluated using weighted Gini impurity. ranger implementation uses split.select.weights parameter apply regularization penalties, approximating RRF regularization approach.
